title: 你们开光影都卡么
txt_content: 我家很卡低配才15fps，普通的1fps

replies.author: luowen
replies.txt_content: 配置低肯定卡咯 然而我家直接就烧了...

replies.author: t666
replies.txt_content: 一开直接卡到爆

replies.author: 亓官冬昤
replies.txt_content: 真实光影比较喜欢，配置好我骄傲

replies.author: 宅男~
replies.txt_content: 玩久了自然就卡了，这跟电脑配置有关吧。

replies.author: simon3000
replies.txt_content: 不卡围观

replies.author: rainsojey
replies.txt_content: 那应该是电脑配置不行吧

replies.author: GodLion
replies.txt_content: 光影是给配置高的电脑开的，目前我见过最牛逼的光影需要16G的RAM。。。。。。。。。。

replies.author: ItIsEnderman
replies.txt_content: 不太卡，至少不影响截图
低配17fps左右普通不敢开

replies.author: SuperXingYu
replies.txt_content: 开低配不卡

replies.author: w505
replies.txt_content: 一般卡吧= =

replies.author: falsh_asan
replies.txt_content: 低配满帧，中配40，高配30，超级20~30

replies.author: abc2040605370
replies.txt_content: 低配0FPS

replies.author: asd13689
replies.txt_content: 我都不开·= = 没什么大用感觉。

replies.author: 盛世安好°
replies.txt_content: 感觉不是卡。。玩单人的时候加载方块感觉是有点慢的

replies.author: 朱叶康
replies.txt_content: 小霸王机子表示很卡
你说什么？卡？滑稽

replies.author: 勇敢说的战士说
replies.txt_content: 为什么要开光影呢，只不过是好看了点而已嘛。

replies.author: 爱拍国殇
replies.txt_content: 电脑配置渣就卡 反正我是不卡

replies.author: 逍遥的小羊
replies.txt_content: 会掉不会卡
